traits.name: Inverted Crucifix
traits.description: When slain, leaves a space of adverse terrain or (4+) a wall instead of a corpse

abilities.name: Beckon
abilities.description: Effect: Pull 1. Ignores line of sight.

abilities.name: Shudder
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage and (4+) Dooms unit.

upgrades.name: Dead Grasp
upgrades.description: Beckon has no maximum range against isolated units

upgrades.name: Impending Death
upgrades.description: Beckon inflicts 1 weak on isolated units.

traits.name: Slither
traits.description: Has free movement while adjacent to a wall

abilities.name: Tombraiser
abilities.description: Effect: Create a wall (3+) then create adverse terrain (5+) then create adverse terrain again.

abilities.name: Kidnap
abilities.description: Curset: Pull 1, ignoring line of sight. If pulling a unit into a wall, pull 3 instead and the kidnapped unit can pass through walls and units during this pull.

abilities.name: Serpent's Kiss
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Effect: Inflicts 1 curse damage and 1 weak against isolated units (4+) and Dooms them.

upgrades.name: Ivory Serpent
upgrades.description: Serpent's Kiss also triggers its effects against units standing in adverse terrain

upgrades.name: Leap
upgrades.description: May step 1 before ACTing, or step 2 and clear a token if adjacent to a wall

traits.name: Teleport
traits.description: When MOVEing a second time or more in a turn, may instead remove self from the battlefield, then place anywhere in free space in range 4

abilities.name: Horrendous Shriek
abilities.description: Curse: Splash (self): foes gain 1 weak. (5+): and are Doomed. Doomed units take 1 curse damage.

abilities.name: Urgal Blade
abilities.description: On hit: 2 curse damage. Effect: Against isolated units, gain 1 strength and may then MOVE again.

upgrades.name: Terrorize
upgrades.description: Gain 2 strength if Horrendous Shriek hits an isolated foe.

upgrades.name: Soul Frost
upgrades.description: When teleporting, create a space of adverse terrain in the first space vacated.

upgrades.name: Condemn
upgrades.description: Shriek obliterates Doomed units at 1 hp or lower.

abilities.name: Bale Scream
abilities.description: Effect: Line: 1 curse damage. Isolated units take 1 curse damage again. May penetrate walls and does not damage walls. Effect: If this line passes through a wall, this unit gains 1 strength.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Effect: Create a wall in range and (5+) adjacent foes to the wall gain 1 weak.

upgrades.name: Doom Bell
upgrades.description: Tombstone gains effect (6+): adjacent foes are Doomed

upgrades.name: Freeze Soul
upgrades.description: If Bale Scream slays a unit, it creates a space of adverse terrain instead of a corpse.

upgrades.name: Siren
upgrades.description: Bale Scream pulls all units in its area 1.

traits.name: Labyrinth Master
traits.description: Before MOVEing, may remove and place one adjacent wall in any other free adjacent space.

abilities.name: Hell's Grasp
abilities.description: Effect: Choose an isolated unit. That unit gains 1 weak and may no longer MOVE or step until the end of its next turn or until it's no longer isolated.

abilities.name: Beckon Lamb
abilities.description: Effect: Unit gains 2 weak and is pulled 3.

abilities.name: Horrendous End
abilities.description: On hit: Deals 1 damage, +1 for each of the following that is true about the target: Doomed, Isolated, Weak, In adverse terrain

upgrades.name: To the Slaughter
upgrades.description: Beckon Lamb has no maximum range against Doomed units

upgrades.name: Supremacy
upgrades.description: Attacks against other Tyrants cannot have their damage reduced and obliterate their targets instead of slaying them.

traits.name: Dread Presence
traits.description: May move through walls. Isolated units gain -1D on attacks against this unit.

abilities.name: Doomblade
abilities.description: On hit: 1 curse damage, or 2 curse damage against Doomed foes. Effect: Isolated foes are then Doomed.

soulAbilities.name: Cyclopean Monolith
soulAbilities.timing: Own or allied turn. Range 2-3. Trigger: Start of turn.
soulAbilities.description: Effect: Create a wall in range and inflict 1 weak on an adjacent foe to the wall.

soulAbilities.name: Soulfeed
soulAbilities.description: Effect: All isolated foes in range take 1 curse damage, gain 1 weak, and this unit gains 1 strength for each of these foes.

upgrade.name: Teleport
upgrade.description: When MOVEing the second time or more in a turn, can remove this unit from the battlefield and place it in any free space in range 4, then clear a token.

upgrade.name: Puppet Master
upgrade.description: May use body block from within range 2 instead of adjacent.

upgrade.name: Maggot Destroyer
upgrade.description: +1D on attacks and ignores cover against Doomed units

upgrade.name: Unholy Summoning
upgrade.description: Effect: Pull 2. Ignores line of sight. If the unit is an ally, may then pull another allied unit and clear a token on both allies.

upgrade.name: Vapor Form
upgrade.description: Effect: MOVE with free movement, moving through walls and units. Units passed through gain 1 weak. Doomed units take 1 curse damage.

upgrade.name: Tear Soul
upgrade.description: Effect: Unit takes 1 curse damage. Then, it gains 1 weak for every 1 hp it is missing.

upgrade.name: Frozen Hell
upgrade.description: Create up to three spaces of adverse terrain in range. Units standing in adverse terrain in range take 1 damage.

upgrade.name: Great Urgal Blade
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage. Effect: At round 4 or later, deals 4 curse damage on hit instead.

upgrade.name: Bloody Flail
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage. Effect: Pull all foes in range 1 space, then splash (self): 1 curse damage. Against doomed units, damage cannot be reduced in any way.

upgrade.name: Lathean Devil Whip
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 curse damage. Effect: Cannot benefit from strength. Instead, may remove up to three weak tokens from target to increase curse damage by +1 per weak token removed.

upgrade.name: Twist Sinews
upgrade.description: Trigger: Start of turn. Effect: Pull unit 1 in any direction.

upgrade.name: Writhing Curse
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: At the end of their turn, foe inflicts splash (self) 1 curse damage and 1 weak, only affecting their allies.

upgrade.name: Disincorporate
upgrade.description: Effect: Remove self and an adjacent allied unit, then place self in free space in range 3, then place ally adjacent. If there is no room to place allies, return them at their original location.

upgrade.name: Eternal Curse
upgrade.description: Trigger: A unit is slain. Effect: Transfer all negative tokens to a different unit anywhere.

upgrade.name: Malebolge
upgrade.description: Effect: Scour the battlefield with frozen wind, pulling all foes 1 space in the same direction. Foes that would be pulled into walls or adverse terrain take 1 damage.

upgrade.name: Great Satania
upgrade.description: Effect: Doom all enemy units in range. All Doomed enemy units instead take 1 curse damage, once, per Doom token they have.
